segments.text: I'm still fixated on this woman by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is practically sloshing around her feet, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues to polish that plate with such meticulous, unwavering care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so utterly oblivious to her immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually starting to feel a bit angry at her incredible carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is clearly running, and the basin is full to the brim, overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not a subtle leak; it's a visible sheet of water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression is almost maddening given the sheer volume of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's absolutely surprising how she maintains such composure amidst the deluge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors below are getting soaked, they will surely be damaged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment from reality is truly astounding to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to tap her on the shoulder and point out the obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR
